en.title: Welcome to CharacterCraft!
en.text:
üöÄIntroducing Character Craft 5.5e, the ultimate solution for RPG players seeking a modern and efficient tool for character creation and management.

Key Features:

Intuitive Multi-Language Interface: Enjoy a guided, step-by-step character creation process available in multiple languages.

Comprehensive Character Management: Easily organize and access all your character information.

Simple Import and Export: Share your characters and homebrew content with friends via JSON or XML files.

Clear JSON File Structure: Ideal for content creators looking to customize and expand their libraries.

Integrated Initiative Tracker: Quickly add characters and monsters to streamline gameplay during crucial moments.

Built-in Dice Roller: Automate attack rolls, saving time and reducing manual calculations.

Customizable Organization: Rearrange feats and equipment with a simple swipe, prioritizing what's most important to you.

While this is the initial release and some bugs may be present, your support is essential for us to continually improve the app until we reach version 1.0. Thank you for joining us on this journey, and we hope Character Craft 5.5e enhances your RPG adventures.
